document.title: Simple Upper Arch Aligner Treatment
document.summary: This is a straightforward case focused on the upper arch using clear aligners. The anticipated treatment duration is around 4–6 months, with progress primarily monitored remotely. Extensive attachments will be applied to ensure accurate tooth movement. Whitening is included as part of the treatment plan.
key_points: Simple case focused on the upper arch
Extensive attachments to guide tooth movement
